LanguageData.HC_Giant.label: Giant
LanguageData.HC_Giant.description: A gigantic creature that averages a height of 16 feet. Requires more food and has lower intellects, but the thick skin and sheer mass results in devastating strength.
LanguageData.HC_Giant.tools.0.label: Left fist
LanguageData.HC_Giant.tools.1.label: Right fist
